alert.note: Alert for Pima (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 31 at 5:35PM MST until August 31 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM MST FOR SOUTH CENTRAL PIMA COUNTY... At 535 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of San Miguel, or 15 miles south of Sells, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sells, Topawa, San Miguel, Ali Chukson, Gu Oidak, Vamori, Cowlic, Fresnal, Choulic, Coldfields, Fresnal Canyon, Artesia, Ali Molina, South Komelik and Itak. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
